title: OPPO Reno 7 Pro Review: Old wine in a new bottle
content:
The OPPO Reno 5 Pro was one of my favorite smartphones from the brand in 2021. It offered powerful hardware, a gorgeous display, and an attractive design — all at a price point that was rather aggressive by OPPO’s standards. Later that year, OPPO also launched the Reno 6 Pro which I called a renovated

The post OPPO Reno 7 Pro Review: Old wine in a new bottle appeared first on xda-developers.
description: The OPPO Reno 7 Pro has a fresh new design with flat edges but retains most of the internals from the Reno 6 Pro. Should you buy one, though?
